modName: Sigil of the Phoenix Carbon Fiber Nightingale Bow
summary: Carbon Fiber Nightingale Bow Retex, with Gunmetal Finish and Custom Phoenix Emblem.
descriptionHtml:
Provided as is.  Feel free to modify and redistribute without limitation.

This is my first ever mod.  Hooray for me!

Better detail pics via images link.

Obviously it should go without saying that this is not a lore-friendly retex.

...


So, there appears to be a mistake in the Nightingale Bow texture making the bowstring wrap off center.  I\'ve compared with the original files, and it is the same.  This is beyond my ability to fix.

I personally can live with it being off center, but if anyone would like to take a crack at getting it fixed, please be my guest.

If you enjoy the file, please endorse.
author: jaredschons

files.name: Sigil of the Phoenix Carbon Fiber and Gunmetal Nightingale Bow Retex
